sections: Motorious readers get more entries now!

is a shiny classic ride from the era of steel bodies and big block engines, buying this 1966 Impala Sports Coupe might just be a dream come true. Who needs to buy one though, when you can enter to win this stunning example. Dream Giveaway Garage is now offering enthusiasts a chance to win this spectacular 427 L72 powered
and they are throwing in $10,000 to cover the taxes. All you have to do is make a generous donation that benefits America’s children and veterans.
to get your entries to win this Impala.
With a shiny Regal Red finish, this

is one of only 1,856 full-size Chevy’s to receive the 425-horsepower Turbo-Jet V8 engine. Other rare options include a Muncie M21 four-speed manual transmission and a Positraction rear end. A special suspension equalization package, metallic brakes, and a heavy-duty generator also make this car one of the better-optioned examples produced. Inside, the interior is equipped with red cloth upholstery, deluxe seat belts, tinted glass, and a Comfortilt steering wheel.
Back in 1966, you could have bought

for $3,800. Today, you might have to add another zero or two to that number. Thanks to Dream Giveaway though, you can now enter to win this car by making a donation of as little as $3.00 or as much as $5,000.00. As always, being more generous will score you more entries and just for being a Motorious reader you get even more tickets when you donate more than $25. What are you waiting for? Follow
, donate more than $25, and get up to 14,400-entries to win this stunning car and $10,000.00 in cash.
